Class GameClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameClient

  • public class GameClient
extends java.lang.Object
    GameClient class controls game logic, sets up server connections and sends updates to board.

    • Method Detail

      • runGame

        public static void runGame(java.net.Socket[] players)
        Start the game logic. Goes through the initial contact, then executes turn order game.
        Parameters:
        players - array of Socket open to servers

      • setup2Player

        public static void setup2Player(java.lang.String[] pairs)
        Start a 2 player game. Sets up connections for two move servers and executes game function.
        Parameters:
        pairs - String array of machine names and port numbers

      • setup4Player

        public static void setup4Player(java.lang.String[] pairs)
        Start a 4 player game. Sets up connections for four move servers and executes game function.
        Parameters:
        pairs - String array of machine names and port numbers

      • broadcastMove

        public static void broadcastMove(java.net.Socket[] players,
                                 int pNum,
                                 java.lang.String move)
        Handles the broadcasting of valid moves to players.
        Parameters:
        players - Array of Sockets open to servers/players.
        pNum - Number of player that made the move.
        move - String of the move made

      • broadcastWinner

        public static void broadcastWinner(java.net.Socket[] players,
                                   int winner)
        Handles broadcasting winner to all players.
        Parameters:
        players - Array of sockets
        winner - Number of player winner

      • requestMove

        public static java.lang.String requestMove(java.net.Socket player)
        Handles the requesting of a move from the server.
        Parameters:
        player - Socket of player to request move from
        pNum - number of the player
        Returns:
        move made by player

      • checkWinner

        public static int checkWinner(LogicalBoard board,
                              int players)
        Handles checking for a winner.
        Parameters:
        board - LogicalGameBoard
        players - number of player in game
        Returns:
        number of the winning player, 0 if none.

      • startGUI

        public static GUI startGUI(int pNum)
        Handles starting the GUI. Nothing more. Nothing less.
        Parameters:
        pNum - number of players in game

      • contactServers

        public static void contactServers(java.net.Socket[] players)
        Handle initial server contact. Send HELLO and GAME messages.
        Parameters:
        players - Array of Sockets open to all servers.

      • getOut

        public static java.io.PrintStream getOut(java.net.Socket player)
        Get PrintStream wrapping OutputStream of Socket. Takes care of gross try-catch block stuff.
        Parameters:
        player - Socket open to a server
        Returns:
        PrintStream wrapper for OutputStream

      • getIn

        Get Scanner wrapping InputStream of Socket. Takes care of gross try-catch block stuff.
        Parameters:
        player - Socket open to a server.
        Returns:
        Scanner wrapper for InputStream

      • socketSetup

        public static java.net.Socket socketSetup(java.lang.String host,
                                          int port)
        Handle creation of socket. Creates socket from machine name and port.
        Parameters:
        host - machine name to connect to
        port - port number to connect to
        Returns:
        Socket open to the machine/port pair given or dies

      • closeConnection

        public static void closeConnection(java.net.Socket[] players)
        Closes connections to all servers at end of game.
        Parameters:
        players - Socket array of connections to close

      • kickPlayer

        public static void kickPlayer(java.net.Socket[] players,
                              int pNum,
                              int index)
        Handles the closing of a specific player connection. i.e. when a player is kicked for an invalid move
        Parameters:
        players - Array of players
        pNum - number of player kicked

      • updateNumber

        public static int updateNumber(int p)
        Updates player number.
        Parameters:
        p - Current player number
        Returns:
        new player number

      • processParams

        public static java.lang.String[] processParams(java.lang.String[] args)
        Handles checks for initial parameters. Checks for proper number of arguments and splits machine/port pairs into an array for easy access
        Parameters:
        args - String array of arguments to process
        Returns:
        String array of separated machine names and port numbers

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
